title: Let's talk URF.
body:
I have an easy solution to this.
Tournament pick, first 3 bans, next three bans, pick. Two bans, two bans, pick.

And for ARURF, let ARURF truly be All Random.
It'll keep memory of the previous champions you've played and never pick it again until you've played everyone else.

replies.body:
> It'll keep memory of the previous champions you've played and never pick it again until you've played everyone else.

But this is not random.

Eventually you _know_ you are getting urgot next.

It would also be hell on the matchmaking system, and would require a completely custom algorithm to deal with edge cases where a bunch of people have tiny pools left.
My suggestion is to have blind pick and the last 3 champions that anyone played are banned.
i agree since arurf is so awful. but riot doesnt want to make it urf again, since they are "killing" the game mode each time it comes out
